item.description:
Saturday, April 17, 2010, noon-5pm
The Worcester VegFest is a FREE festival that brings together residents to celebrate vegetarianismâ€“an animal-friendly, environmentally sustainable, and healthy lifestyle. Our event features socially responsible businesses, inspiring speakers, musicians, and lots of free samples of tasty vegan food.

The Speaker Line Up is Fantastic!

Dr. Michael Greger. M.D., Humane Society, Director of Public Health and Animal Agriculture
Erica Meier, Executive Director, Compassion Over Killing, Clark Alum
Jon Camp, Director of Outreach, Vegan Outreach
John Sanbonmatsu, Associate Professor of Philosophy, WPI

RSVP to the Facebook event.

Get all the details at:
http://vegworcester.c...
item.name: Worcester VegFest 2010
